name: Lackluster Video Store
description:
Created for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 game jam using the theme 'Rewind'.

The player is working in a store called Lackluster where they must manage video returns from the customers. Each video must be rewound and put back onto the shelves.

Players will have to juggle these takes while ensuring that the customer queue does not reach the entrance to the store or the player will be fired.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move player
  • Mouse click - Interact with cassettes, TV-VCR and Shelves
